urls.title: England vs France live updates
urls.description: England take on France in the World Cup quarter-finals today, in one of the standout ties of the tournament. England have scored 12 goals so far in Qatar, conceding only twice, while reigning champions France overcame Poland with ease to underline their intention of retaining their title. The game will also see two of the tournament’s in-form talents meet, in the guise of France forward Kylian Mbappe and England's teenage midfielder Jude Bellingham.We’re going to be joined by Charlotte Harpur, Tim Spiers, Amy Lawrence, Simon Johnson and Ahmed Walid as we preview today’s match. Get your questions in by emailing livebloguk@theathletic.com or tweeting @TheAthleticFC. Background readingFrance and England. Football teams created by immigration. Countries confused by it.Tottenham’s Kane v Tottenham’s Lloris: A World Cup duel beckonsWorld Cup bracket(Photo: Getty Images)

urls.title: Qatar construction firm still operating despite not paying migrant workers
urls.description: Many workers at Al Bandary are still fighting for missing wages yet the company continues to operate from a Doha office block

data.text:
Following an investigation @TheAthleticFC has discovered that a WC construction company that Qatar government said was “closed” is, in fact, still operating as 1000+ migrant workers wait for outstanding payments. 

Full story alongside @Simon_Hughes__

https://t.co/STUdZ7biIq

Packed World Cup Radar show from @TheAthleticFC at 1215 UK

urls.title: Shaw: 'It would be very naive to just focus on Mbappe'
urls.description: Luke Shaw believes England would be “very naive” to focus all their attentions on Kylian Mbappe, ahead of their World Cup quarter-final clash against France on Saturday. Mbappe scored twice and was man of the match in France’s 3-1 last-16 win over Poland on Sunday, just hours before England...

urls.title: England vs Senegal LIVE
urls.description: England face Senegal in the World Cup Round of 16 today.Gareth Southgate's side qualified for this stage of the competition by finishing top of Group B, winning two and drawing one of their matches.Senegal came second in Group A — beating Ecuador and Qatar but losing to the Netherlands.Background readingMarcus Rashford, the renaissanceEngland vs Senegal: Should Rashford start? Our writers name their XIsSenegal tactical guide: Wide players key in attack and defence, and a curious corner optionSouthgate refuses to be drawn on possible France tie ahead of Senegal gameSenegal head coach Cisse unwell and doubt for England gameWorld Cup round of 16: Why you should watch each match(Photo: Getty Images)

urls.title: Poland vs Argentina live updates
urls.description: Hello and welcome to The Athletic's live blog for Argentina against Poland.It’s judgement day for Poland and Argentina when they meet in Group C at the World Cup on Wednesday, November 30.The match will be played at Stadium 974 in Doha.Danny Makkelie is the referee for the game. It will be the Dutchman’s second game at the tournament after he was in charge of the 1-1 draw between Spain and Germany — a game in which he showed four yellow cards.Follow here for live updates throughout the game. (Photo: Getty Images)

urls.title: Wales vs England live updates
urls.description: Hello and welcome to The Athletic's live blog for Wales against England.Gareth Southgate's side need a point to qualify for the knockout stages but anything less than finishing top of Group B would fall below England supporters' expectations. Wales face a tall order to qualify but can qualify with a win if the US and Iran draw. Senegal await the winners of this group, while the Netherlands lie in store for the runners-up.The game kicks off at the Ahmad Bin Ali Stadium at 19:00 GMT, 14:00 EST and 11:00 PT — stay with us for live updates. Wales XI: Danny Ward, Neco Williams, Ben Davies, Chris Mepham, Joe Rodon, Joe Allen, Aaron Ramsey, Gareth Bale, Dan James, Ethan Ampadu, Kieffer Moore.England XI: Jordan Pickford, Kyle Walker, John Stones, Harry Maguire, Luke Shaw, Declan Rice, Jude Bellingham, Jordan Henderson, Harry Kane, Marcus Rashford, Phil Foden.Background readingWales vs England — line-ups and match statsWorld Cup permutationsKnockout stage: Who plays whom and when?World Cup stan

Latest edition direct to your ears from #FIFAWorldCup - hear from @David_Ornstein @mjshrimper @JamesHorncastle @lmwilliamson7 @FelipeCar @dermotmcorrigan & more.

Packed show pre 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 v 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 & 🇺🇸 v 🇮🇷

urls.title: Julian Dicks agrees to join Watford set-up
urls.description: Julian Dicks has agreed to join Watford’s coaching staff and link up with his former West Ham teammate Slaven Bilic, The Athletic can reveal. Dicks is set to start work in his new role on Thursday after being in talks with the Championship club during the last month. He is expected to travel to...

data.text:
#WatfordFC News: Julian Dicks has agreed deal to join Slaven Bilic’s coaching team and due to start later this week. Leaves role in US. 

Details here @TheAthleticFC 

https://t.co/Y12NCo6a05

Reminder: With the start of the final round of group fixtures - @TheAthleticFC’s World Cup Radar live show moves to a new time 🕰️ 

🇶🇦 1500 (Qatar) 
🇬🇧 1200 (GMT) 
🇺🇸 0700 (EST) 

See you later with all the reaction / preview you need from our team at #FIFAWorldCup https://t.co/QIFAdytbwh

urls.title: Mohammed Kudus cements status as one of this World Cup's emerging young stars
urls.description: The 22-year-old became the first Ghana player to score twice in a World Cup match, further enhancing his reputation

data.text:
Fun being at a great game earlier Ghana 3-2 S Korea & amongst all the end to end action there was a cool character called Mohammed Kudus just lifting his star higher in the sky. Spoke to a few of his glowing teammates post match.
✍️ @AnAbnos @TheAthleticFC
https://t.co/E7guT7mUFI

RT @FelipeCar: Good conversation with @AdamLeventhal and @charlotteharpur on yesterday’s Football Podcast @TheAthleticFC 

- Messi and Arge…

Ghana fans celebrate 3-2 victory over South Korea outside Education City Stadium in Qatar. 🇬🇭 

@TheAthleticFC https://t.co/brkbapRcJe

On draft excluder use at free kicks. All free kick taker needs to do is scoop the ball directly over the wall to a teammate who times their run as the wall falls over backwards thanks to their teammate lying behind. That would work wouldn’t it? (Similar to this…) @TheAthleticFC https://t.co/GN91IW5mdB
Delivering 🤝 https://t.co/izvAwEe8vi
And this is my view from the stadium… https://t.co/d788zv5JQW

urls.title: Qatar construction firm still operating despite not paying migrant workers
urls.description: Many workers at Al Bandary are still fighting for missing wages yet the company continues to operate from a Doha office block

tweets.text:
New @TheAthleticFC :

Construction company involved in World Cup-related projects that govt official said was closed & unable to pay outstanding wages to migrant workers is, in fact, still operating. 

@AdamLeventhal found out by rocking up to their office
https://t.co/gIetxbW3MQ

urls.title: Qatar construction firm still operating despite not paying migrant workers

tweets.text: Qatari construction company involved in World Cup-related projects that a government official told me was closed and unable to pay outstanding wages to migrant workers is, actually, still very much open. Investigation with ⁦@AdamLeventhal⁩. https://t.co/8roawJWOgZ

FIFA and Qatar have tried to 'seize the narrative' from negative stories consuming the World Cup.

On the latest episode, @AdamCrafton_, @mjshrimper, @lmwilliamson7 and @AdamLeventhal make sure that doesn't happen.

🎙️ 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗔𝗧𝗛𝗟𝗘𝗧𝗜𝗖 𝗙𝗢𝗢𝗧𝗕𝗔𝗟𝗟 𝗣𝗢𝗗𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗧

urls.title: ‎The Athletic Football Podcast : Kane, Giroud, Richarlison: what makes a World Cup no.9? sur Apple Podcasts
urls.description: ‎Afficher The Athletic Football Podcast, ép Kane, Giroud, Richarlison: what makes a World Cup no.9? - 6 déc. 2022

tweets.text:
Bit late to the party: ⁦@AdamLeventhal⁩’s podcast is by far the best Qatar2022 content (with ⁦@mjshrimper⁩, ⁦@AdamCrafton_⁩ et al.)

Good mix of live coverage, football analysis, and governance/human rights pieces. Works very very well. https://t.co/CuhW3M3qzu

A migrant worker has died during the World Cup while performing repairs at the hotel used as Saudi Arabia's FIFA training base.

The worker fell when asked to fix the lights in a car park. The government is investigating.

Report by @AdamCrafton_

urls.title: The Athletic Football Podcast: Kane, Giroud, Richarlison: what makes a World Cup no.9?
urls.description: Adam Leventhal is joined by James Horncastle, Raphael Honigstein & Jack Pitt-Brooke to debate an analyse the values and importance of a no.9 in international football.With the likes of Olivier Giro...

tweets.text:
Today's @TheAthleticFC podcast is talking about no9s: are they going out of fashion or coming back in?

We discussed Kane, Benzema, Giroud, Aguero, Werner, Henry, Lewandowksi, Haaland and Fullkrug

With @JamesHorncastle @honigstein @AdamLeventhal and me

https://t.co/y5lDRRo6C2

🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 Owen in 1998
🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 Rooney in 2004
🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 Bellingham in 2022

Jude Bellingham is England's latest teenage tournament prodigy, a phenomenon who is turning games & heads.

He looks built to last but his feeling of being unstoppable might never be stronger than it is now.

📝 @OliverKay

✍ The Hornets have agreed terms with Canada international midfielder Ismaël Koné!

#WatfordFC | @CorpayFX
As a German, this professionalism, ruthlessness and efficiency from England is hard to take.

urls.title: World Cup 2022 live updates: Day 14
urls.description: Hello and welcome to our live coverage of the first day of the knockout stages in the Qatar World Cup.Today sees a huge game for the USMNT against the Netherlands, before Australia take on Argentina.Background reading World Cup fixtures and full scheduleWorld Cup standingsWorld Cup knockout bracketYour guide to every team at Qatar 2022Why the Qatar World Cup is controversialWorld Cup 2022 — a beginner’s guide: Every question you’ve been too afraid to ask(Photo: Getty Images)

tweets.text: England set for #Qatar2022 R16 tie v Senegal. #ENG squad has clean bill of health so some hard selection calls. 1st ever meeting between sides; #ThreeLions unbeaten in all 7 #FIFAWorldCup games v African teams. W/ @AdamLeventhal @TheAthleticFC https://t.co/VAqsBlkeuX #ENGSEN #SEN https://t.co/YrY4UJotLw https://t.co/kAzw5YCBik

urls.title: The Athletic Football Podcast
urls.description: The Athletic Football Podcast is our flagship show, running daily during the World Cup as we bring you all the biggest stories from on the ground in Qatar. Featuring the likes of David Ornstein, Adam Crafton, Matt Slater and many others and hosted by Adam Leventhal, we'll provide exclusive news and the best analysis anywhere of the most controversial World Cup in history.

tweets.text:
Reflected on where Ghana’s revenge mission went wrong, Luis Suarez’s tears and much more on @TheAthleticFC pod with @PaulTenorio @AdamLeventhal plus producer @abipaterson from the streets of Doha 🇶🇦🇬🇭🇺🇾

#FIFAWorldCup #Qatar2022 

https://t.co/hZPbhkXArQ https://t.co/Zj8Nc8JWSb

urls.title: Odion Ighalo: 'I would love for Cristiano Ronaldo to come to Saudi Arabia'
urls.description: Odion Ighalo swapped Manchester United for Saudi Arabia and now hopes Cristiano Ronaldo will follow the same path

tweets.text:
Video: Spoke to former #MUFC striker Odion Ighalo (now at Al Hilal) here in Doha about the potential of being joined by free agent Cristiano Ronaldo in Saudi Arabia. 

Read full article on @TheAthleticFC via this link: https://t.co/k2HsxBvu52 https://t.co/2lN8YOZJqV

@AdamLeventhal @TheAthleticFC Do you at least have a lift to get most of the way up? Out of 23 games I attended/will attend, 21 are in the top tier. I've got level 7 in Lusail for the QF. Makes Newcastle away seem like a pleasant stroll

urls.title: Despite World Cup heartbreak, Brighton's Pervis Estupinan will return a better player
urls.description: Estupinan's Ecuador may have gone out in the groups, but the Brighton player's performances in Qatar were a reminder of his special talent

tweets.text:
Pervis Estupinan for £15m is another example of Brighton’s shrewd recruitment.
A look at the tea-loving “Roadrunner” who had 4 seasons at Watford without playing a game for them.
With @AdamLeventhal and @dermotmcorrigan #BHAFC #FIFAWorldCupQatar2022 
https://t.co/SbvfXD7L6R
Argentina so impressive tonight you could be forgiven for thinking Lewandowski wasn't on the pitch. His first touch in ages is stolen by Enzo Fernandez

Back at the 974 stadium for a big one tonight… #Fifaworldcup 

Poland v Argentina

urls.title: The Athletic Football Podcast: Messi's Flash of Genius as Mbappe Tussles For Limelight & Queiroz v Klinsmann
urls.description: It's Sunday morning and host Adam Leventhal is joined by The Athletic's Felipe Cardenas and Charlotte Harpur to reflect on Lionel Messi handing Argentina a World Cup lifeline in typical style...Jam...

tweets.text:
Good conversation with @AdamLeventhal and @charlotteharpur on yesterday’s Football Podcast @TheAthleticFC 

- Messi and Argentina’s emotional win vs Mexico
- El Tri’s ongoing struggles
- Mbappe’s cruising in Qatar
- Klinsmann’s ridiculous comments
https://t.co/gStEEQmuVy

Here we go then… lot to live up to.

South Korea v Ghana 

Live blog here for @TheAthleticFC 

Liked the side to side thing the S Korean fans did with their flag during the anthem… 

https://t.co/tdWVvCLIey
